mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article_search (article_id, keywords, tsv, update_time) VALUES (#{articleId}, #{keywords}, #{tsv}::tsvector, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE article_search SET keywords = #{keywords}, tsv = CAST(#{tsVectorStr} AS tsvector), update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.select: SELECT article_id FROM article_search WHERE tsv @@ CAST(#{tsQueryStr} AS tsquery) ORDER BY ts_rank(tsv, CAST(#{tsQueryStr} AS tsquery)) DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article_search WHERE tsv @@ CAST(#{tsQueryStr} AS tsquery)
